name: Sholium
author: GreenKookie
description:
Made with Joker Forge by jaychw.

What if bloonalatro was way more unbalanced, funnier and stupider? Behold the Sholium.
This mod was crafted to be stupidly unbalanced and have really dumb joker effects or something idk ._.  
The numbers in the parentheses are the specific btd6 versions that the joker effects are referring to.
Other things you might stumple upon including inside jokes, self insert and much more.
Have fun i guess
